Trailing content: Navigation
List items that take you to a new view or opens a sheet. They
have the same layout attributes as actionable list items but
Label > always have an arrow or a chevron as a trailing icon. In contextual
menus you do not have to provide a trailing icon for navigation.

Edge to edge or inset
List View Items can span the entire width of a viewport, such as
IKEA — i i
IKEA Family Card } on mobile web and small screens, or they can be inset and nested
- within a layout. The dividers just span the width of the item row,
leaving the container to provide its own padding. List View Item
on mobile native always has a fixed horizontal padding.
